question: You have been living in a rental apartment for the past year. Recently a new neighbour moved in who has loud parties several times a week. Write a letter complaining about this to the landlord. In your letter:•	explain the situation•	describe why it bothers you•	suggest a solution
text: I am writing this letter to request you to kindly give me some extra time to pay the rent to you.

As you know for the last ten years, I am your tenant and I have successfully paid the rent on time always. I have never created any nuisance for you or the neighbours around. Owing to the warmth of our bond, I am expecting you to kindly cooperate with me in this situation.

Due to some uncertain circumstances, I lost my current job due to the recession I was terminated from the job which I had with Cerner Pvt. Ltd. The Salary would be put on hold as I will get the amount as a full and final settlement after 45 days from last working date which is June 25.
I promise to pay the complete pending dues with the rent for the new month on June 26. Your cooperation during our tough times will be highly appreciated.
